name: lookup-service-ui
description: Quickly check tokens & badges of addresses.
author: Ethcore Team <admin@ethcore.io>

scripts.bundle: env NODE_ENV=production browserify -p [ csjs-extractify -o bundle.css ] -g [ babelify --presets es2015 ] -t envify index.js > bundle.js
scripts.build: npm run bundle && npm run minify
scripts.start: export NODE_ENV=dev; watchify -p [ csjs-extractify -o bundle.css ] -g [ babelify --presets es2015 ] -t envify index.js -o bundle.js
scripts.prepush: npm run lint && npm run build
